availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Ruben J. Newman (Livingston County, Kentucky, resident)

body.p: Livingston County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of Orville Newman. Resident of Livingston County, Kentucky, in 1850. Attended school in Livingston County in 1860. Killed by Ferdinand Fife in Livingston County, Kentucky, on July 25, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, p. 368B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Livingston County, District 2, p. 233.
"R. J. Newman (1844-1864)," Find A Grave, Memorial 43366426, accessed April 11, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43366426.
